version_description: Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

• An enhanced notifications experience lets you more easily manage your push notifications. Now you can enable, disable, and add new notifications from a single screen
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• An enhanced notifications experience lets you more easily manage your push notifications. Now you can enable, disable, and add new notifications from a single screen
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Minor enhancements / fixes

• An enhanced notifications experience lets you more easily manage your push notifications. Now you can enable, disable, and add new notifications from a single screen
• Minor enhancements / fixes

• Critical Alerts - With this feature enabled, Alarm event notifications to the app will play a sound, even if your phone is muted or in Do Not Disturb mode.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Critical Alerts - With this feature enabled, Alarm event notifications to the app will play a sound, even if your phone is muted or in Do Not Disturb mode.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Critical Alerts - With this feature enabled, Alarm event notifications to the app will play a sound, even if your phone is muted or in Do Not Disturb mode.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Critical Alerts - With this feature enabled, Alarm event notifications to the app will play a sound, even if your phone is muted or in Do Not Disturb mode.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Quick swipe between systems - If you have multiple linked systems you can now switch quickly from one system to the next by swiping left/right on the system name in the header (if fewer than 8 linked systems), or tapping the system name to bring up a list of systems. Have multiple systems that aren’t yet linked to the same login? Link multiple systems by going to “Login Information” in the left-hand menu and selecting the “Linked Systems” option.

• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features.

• Quick swipe between systems - If you have multiple linked systems you can now switch quickly from one system to the next by swiping left/right on the system name in the header (if fewer than 8 linked systems), or tapping the system name to bring up a list of systems. Have multiple systems that aren’t yet linked to the same login? Link multiple systems by going to “Login Information” in the left-hand menu and selecting the “Linked Systems” option.

• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features.

• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features.

• Quick swipe between systems - If you have multiple linked systems you can now switch quickly from one system to the next by swiping left/right on the system name in the header (if fewer than 8 linked systems), or tapping the system name to bring up a list of systems. Have multiple systems that aren’t yet linked to the same login? Link multiple systems by going to “Login Information” in the left-hand menu and selecting the “Linked Systems” option.

• Behind the scenes improvements to power future features.

•  Scene support  now available on Apple Watch
•  Enhanced video doorbell experience includes full duplex support
•  Shade and lighting control improvements
•  Minor bug fixes and enhancements

• System Search - Customers with more than 10 linked systems can now leverage search on the system selector that appears in the side menu.
• Today Widget for Lights - Now you can control your lights directly from the Today View. Set up this feature under the App Settings tab in the lefthand navigation.
• Performance Improvements and enhancements 
• Bug Fixes

• System Search - Customers with more than 10 linked systems can now leverage search on the system selector that appears in the side menu.
• Today Widget for Lights - Now you can control your lights directly from the Today View. Set up this feature under the App Settings tab in the lefthand navigation.
• Performance Improvements and enhancements 
• Bug Fixes

• System Search - Customers with more than 10 linked systems can now leverage search on the system selector that appears in the side menu.
• Today Widget for Lights - Now you can control your lights directly from the Today View. Set up this feature under the App Settings tab in the lefthand navigation.
• Performance Improvements and enhancements 
• Bug Fixes

• System Search - Customers with more than 10 linked systems can now leverage search on the system selector that appears in the side menu.
• Today Widget for Lights - Now you can control your lights directly from the Today View. Set up this feature under the App Settings tab in the lefthand navigation.
• Performance Improvements and enhancements 
• Bug Fixes

• Home Screen Quick Actions - Users with a doorbell camera can now set up a Home Screen Quick Action via the App Settings menu, to start a doorbell call from the app launcher icon.

• Doorbell Call Screen Enhancements - Access additional actions from the Doorbell call screen. Now you can arm your system as well as control lights, garage, and access control doors — all without leaving an active doorbell call.

• Moving? Get Access to all the information you need within your app to get ADT set up in your new home

• Performance enhancements and bug fixes:

-Fixed issue preventing landscape rotation on SVR full screen view
-Fixed issue on iOS 11 and 12 when opening the app from a notification after an app update
-Small UI improvements to fix cut off screen content during camera installation on iPad
-Fixed filter icon issue when scrolling rapidly on Saved Clips screen. 
-Fixed refresh icon that would appear in some scenarios after staying on a screen for too long or leaving the app from a given screen and returning later. 
-Fixed filter icon issue when scrolling rapidly on Saved Clips screen. 
-Fixed refresh icon that would appear in some scenarios after staying on a screen for too long or leaving the app from a given screen and returning late

• Home Screen Quick Actions - Users with a doorbell camera can now set up a Home Screen Quick Action via the App Settings menu, to start a doorbell call from the app launcher icon.

• Doorbell Call Screen Enhancements - Access additional actions from the Doorbell call screen. Now you can arm your system as well as control lights, garage, and access control doors — all without leaving an active doorbell call.

• Moving? Get Access to all the information you need within your app to get ADT set up in your new home

• Control Lights with Siri Shortcuts - Under App Settings, you can now set up a voice shortcut to control your lights and light groups via Siri.
• Manage Devices: Rename or remove a device via the “Manage Devices” option in the left-hand menu.
• Performance enhancements and bug fixes
